revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: Year 4. Report from Menches, komogrammateus of Kerkeosiris, on the watering and sowing of the land through Paophi 20. In year 3, 1193 3/4 arourae of land, the rent of which is 4665 5/12, and out of these 1122 1/4 arourai at 4313 11/12 artabae have been watered through Paophi 20. The remaining arourae on which water is standing are 71 1/2 at 351 1/2 artabae. And out of the watered portion were sown with lentil 9 arourae at 44 1/4 artabae, with arakos 35 arourae at 167 1/2 artabae; pasturage: 60 arourae at 60 artabae. They total 104 arourae at 271 3/4 artabae. The remainder which are being seeded in due order (are) 1018 1/4 arourae at 4042 1/6.

listBibl.bibl: P.Tebt., I.71; Verhoogt, Menches, p.169. On line 8 see BL v. 7, p. 269
